Desc.entry: Gilian Cally, a professional actress (LAMBDA trained with a BA in Drama and English from the University of Natal, Durban) offers tuition in public speaking, presentation skills, interview technique and confidence building, also elocution (articulation, enunciation, projection, range and correct breathing and accent). Tuition is available in audition technique to students wishing to gain entry to drama school as well as the study and appreciation of texts for students of Drama and English. Caters for adults and also for children aged 13-18 years. Works from contact address or in the workplace of a business and occasionally in students' homes in the South Sheffield area.
